name: LibraryManagementSystem
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: library management system
des: The skill helps in managing a library by doing tasks such as telling the location of a book, issuing a book, returning a book and showing some useful reports. I developed this skill for my college's final year project to demonstrate speech processing using Alexa.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
